system.effect:
All Creatures have size, which determines Ease of being Hit, Concealment, and Base Movement (Apply Size's Effect to movement prior to any other effects, like being a Quadruped to a minimum of 1):
Miniscule (1) (-30/+30/AB-3), Puny (2) (-20/+20/AB-2), Scrawny (3) (-10/+10/AB-1), Average (4) (0/0/AB), Hulking (5) (+10/-10/AB+1), Enormous (6) (+20/-20/AB+2), Massive (7) (+30/-30/AB+3). Humans are by default Average Size.
